name: Logo Design Contest for EcoBrand
description: We are looking for a fresh, modern logo for our new eco-friendly brand focused on sustainable products. The logo should convey nature, trust, and innovation.
instruction: Submit your logo in PNG format with transparent background. Include variations in color and black/white. Provide a short explanation of your design choices.

name: Best Short Story Contest 2026
description: Write an original short story (max 2000 words) on the theme 'Future Worlds'. Open to all genres: sci-fi, fantasy, horror, etc.
instruction: Submit as PDF or Word document. Include your name and title on the first page. No plagiarism allowed.

name: Innovative Business Idea Pitch
description: Pitch your best startup idea in the field of AI or sustainability. Top ideas will get feedback from investors.
instruction: Submit a 5-slide pitch deck (PDF) and a one-page executive summary.

name: Mobile App UI/UX Design Challenge
description: Redesign the homepage and key screens of a fitness tracking app. Focus on user-friendly and modern design.
instruction: Submit Figma link or high-res screenshots. Include wireframes and final designs.

name: Gaming Review: Best Indie Games 2025
description: Write a detailed review of your favorite indie game released in 2025. Include gameplay, story, and why it stands out.
instruction: Submit as text (800-1500 words) or video link (YouTube). Be honest and insightful.

name: Photography Contest: Urban Life
description: Capture the essence of urban life in your city. Black & white or color photos welcome.
instruction: Submit up to 3 high-resolution photos with titles and short descriptions.

name: Article Writing: Future of AI
description: Write a thoughtful article (1000-2000 words) about the future impact of AI on society.
instruction: Submit in Markdown or Word format. Cite sources if needed.

name: Poster Design for Music Festival
description: Design an eye-catching poster for an upcoming electronic music festival.
instruction: Submit A3 size design in PDF. Include space for sponsor logos.

name: Best Mobile Game Concept
description: Pitch your original mobile game idea. Include gameplay mechanics, target audience, and monetization.
instruction: Submit a document with concept art (optional) and detailed description.

name: Creative Video Ad for Product
description: Create a 30-60 second video advertisement for a new smartwatch.
instruction: Submit YouTube or Vimeo link. Original content only.
